actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from minimum wage and overtime coverage employees employed to provide only babysitting services.

summary.text: Excludes from minimum wage and overtime coverage under the Fair Labor Standards Act employees employed to provide only babysitting services.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Fair Labor Standards Act of 1938 to exclude from minimum wage and overtime coverage employees employed to provide only babysitting services.
